1153.name: Dur 12 PTA Powder
1153.Applications: Steam-valves, high temperature liquid pumps, hot cutting tools, cutting tools for plastic, wood and paper as well as high stressed sealings and sliding surfaces.
1153.Suitable_For: Dur 12 PTA Powder is typically used for cutting tools that need to withstand abrasion, heat and corrosion. Examples include industrial knives for cutting carpets, plastics, paper and synthetic fibres; and saw tips in the timber industry. It is also used for control plates in the beverage industry, pump vanes, bearing bushes and narrowneck glass mold plungers; and for hardfacing of engine valves, pinch rollers in the metal-processing industries, and rotor blade edges.
